nodes.text: Jerf Huxley's cantina was a cantina in the Outer Rim Territories that was frequented by smugglers including Jerf Huxley and his Huxlings. Its decor was markedly different from cantinas on Coruscant and the other Core Worlds, including gaudy wall hangings, old plumbing and polished droid parts from before the Clone Wars. The cantina had unbreakable mugs and stone-topped tables, both signs of the frequent blaster fights that took place there.

In 22 ABY, Mara Jade Skywalker met with Huxley at the cantina to terminate Talon Karrde's working relationship with the Huxlings. This prompted Huxley to confront Jade Skywalker and try extracting a severance payment from Karrde, with the aid of about twenty Huxlings, including Sinker.
Jerf Huxley's cantina first appeared in the 2004 Star Wars novel Survivor's Quest written by Timothy Zahn.
